overview: A touching, funny and intense insight into the workings of a modern day renaissance project. Featuring rare interviews with Chris Corner, producer Jim Abiss, the live band members, and Sneaker Pimps co-founder Liam Howe, plus special footage of live performances and backstage madness.
tagline: The making of 'The Unified Field', the 5th album by alternative electronic outfit IAMX.
title: You Can Be Happy
